sections.heading: Appeals; procedure.An appeal of any final action of the board may be taken to the Court of Appeals
sections.text: Such appeal shall be in accordance with rules provided by law for appeals in civil cases.SourceLaws 1963, c. 397, ยง 16, p. 1265;Laws 1991, LB 732, ยง 123;Laws 2003, LB 187, ยง 13.AnnotationsDecision of
